name: tradepredictions
description: Attempt to created a neural network to help decide to long or short SPX, NDX and RUT.

scripts.extractgenome: (title Extract Genome & node ./controller/extractGenome.js) && title Extract Genome
scripts.predictgeneticalgo: (title Predict Genetic Algo & node ./controller/predictGeneticAlgo.js) && title Predict Genetic Algo
scripts.predictneuralnetwork: (title Predict Neural Network & node ./controller/predictNeuralNetwork.js) && title Predict Neural Network
scripts.traingeneticalgo: (title Train Genetic Algo & node ./controller/trainGeneticAlgo.js) && title Train Genetic Algo
scripts.trainneuralnetwork: (title Train Neural Network & node ./controller/trainNeuralNetwork.js) && title Train Neural Network
scripts.updatedata: (title Update Data & node ./controller/updateData.js) && title Update Data
scripts.updatevolumeprofile: (title Update Volume Profile & node ./controller/updateVolumeProfile.js) && title Update Volume Profile
scripts.validategeneticalgo: (title Validate Genetic Algo & node ./controller/validateGeneticAlgo.js) && title Validate Genetic Algo
scripts.validateneuralnetwork: (title Validate Neural Network & node ./controller/validateNeuralNetwork.js) && title Validate Neural Network

author: Shahfazliz Shahron
